sentences.en: Aries: Remember that the world doesn't revolve around you, Aries.
sentences.cn: 白羊座: 白羊们要记住,世界不是围着你转.

sentences.en: As many visitors might expect, Qingdao's culinary specialties revolve around seafood.
sentences.cn: 徐:正如很多客人所想的那样, 青岛的烹饪特色以海味为主.

sentences.en: But do you know why the heat can revolve the paper snake?
sentences.cn: 同学们都认为是“热”让纸蛇转动起来的,但是,为什么“热”就能使纸蛇转动 呢 ?

sentences.en: Decisional roles is managerial roles that revolve around making choices.
sentences.cn: 决策制定角色是为组织做决定的管理角色.

sentences.en: It is important to revolve around the information they needed.
sentences.cn: 能够不断地为客户提供需求方面的解答是非常重要的.

sentences.en: Religions revolve madly around sexual questions.
sentences.cn: 宗教常疯狂的围绕在性的问题上团团转.

sentences.en: Religions revolve madly round sexual questions.
sentences.cn: 种种宗教,都在性问题的周围疯狂地团团转.
卫星绕各自的行星运转.

sentences.en: The restaurant slowly revolves, giving excellent views of the city.
sentences.cn: 餐厅缓缓旋转，城市美景尽收眼底。

sentences.en: The wheels began to revolve slowly.
Underneath the Revolve tab, you will see the Surface Options.
sentences.cn: 下旋转选项卡上, 您会看到表面的选择.

sentences.en: Using graphics software, you can revolve the image on the screen.
sentences.cn: 使用绘图软件可以旋转屏幕上的图像。

sentences.en: Using special fixed setting, so that handle will not revolve.
sentences.cn: 特有的固定装置, 使手柄不会有任何转动.

sentences.en: Using special fixed setting, so that the handle will not revolve.
sentences.cn: 把手上根据客户需要可安装投币锁, 使卖场便于管理.

sentences.en: Very strong winds revolve around the eye.
sentences.cn: 非常强的风绕着这个台眼旋卷.
轮子在处于运动状态时旋转.

sentences.en: Your resources here revolve around manpower , munitions, and fuel.
sentences.cn: 在游戏中你需关注的资源包括人力 、 军需品和燃料.

words.tran_cn: 革命的；旋转的；大变革的
旋转（revolve的过去式，过去分词）
使…旋转；使…循环；反复考虑

trans.tran_en: to move around like a wheel, or to make something move around like a wheel
to move around like a wheel, or to make something move around like a wheel
